title: VR Game Development Competition in the Near Future - Novel Updates
author: カンチェラーラ
description:
Sometime in 22nd century Japan.

A fully immersive VR(virtual reality) that people believed could only be achieved in their dreams was invented in the United States.

While it was delayed for a few years, the Japanese gaming industry finally starts to develop their own VR games.

While many large-scale manufacturers are working on VR games, small-scale manufacturers had also held meetings today to build their own VR games>
